name: Profanity Filter
description: Flags messages containing a list of common profanity words.

name: Age Declaration Check
description: Flags messages that appear to be a date of birth and checks if the age is below the minimum.

name: Response Length Check
description: Flags messages that are too short or unusually long based on a user's Nitro status.

name: Bot Signature Detection
description: Flags messages containing phrases commonly used by bots to bypass verification.
